mapper.insert: insert into shopping_items (items_idx, items_img, items_title, items_price, items_numb, items_status, items_name, items_email, items_member_idx) values (shopping_items_seq.nextval, #{items_img}, #{items_title}, #{items_price}, #{items_numb}, #{items_status}, #{items_name}, #{items_email}, #{items_member_idx})
mapper.select: select * from shopping_items order by items_idx desc
